price: 92. En er zal tegen hen gezegd worden: “Waar zijn zij die jullie aanbaden,
arabic: وَقِيلَ لَهُمۡ أَيۡنَ مَا كُنتُمۡ تَعۡبُدُونَ

version.title: Dutch translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Dutch language, for the Dutch Islamic Center - in progress.

meta.transliteration: waqīla lahum ayna mā kuntum taʿbudūna
